description: This file defines a script that sets up a team of AI agents for researching Hacker News stories, including their configuration, tools, and a method to generate a report.

classes.name: Article
classes.description: A data model representing an article with title, summary, and reference links.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method called on hn_team to generate and print an article about top hackernews stories.

search-terms: Python script for AI research team
